channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: TOTP 2
channel.desc: From the pop-soul vocal groups and all-female rock and roll bands of the 60s, to the 90s ladettes with attitude and doll domination of the noughties - welcome to woman's hour, `Top of the Pops' style. This show celebrates a gaggle of girls in performance at the BBC, from the Spice Girls to The Supremes, Labelle to TLC, and The Pointer Sisters to B.Witched.
